content.content: Hey guys, It’s the delegate Hiturunk here with Penguin Party! I thought I’d give penguinparty.eth , PenguinParty’s multi-sig for voting, it’s own page. You can keep up with our latest information at: Fish Scoreboard:https://penguinparty-eth.github.io/SourceCred-Instance/#/explorer Discord: https://discord.gg/XscWVvH Medium: medium.com/@Hiturunk Twitter: https://twitter.com/PenguinpartyE Twitter: https://twitter.com/HiturunkE Youtube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCvcz0jSa65MZSQMB3hMNAkA Github: https://github.com/penguinparty-eth/ Codecks: https://open.codecks.io/-penguinparty/  We at Penguin Party are running a multi-sig with three co-delegates (I’m one of them!) and developing an application to interact with Uniswap governance. As well, we developed and deployed the Uniswap implementation of Autonomous Proposals. We are the only Decentralized Delegation on Uniswap, and we are totally community-run. Anyone can join us in our discord and begin contributing to the future of Defi governance with a slew of feature-rich discord integrations to ensure the community gets a say in our development. : ) You can delegate to the multi-sig easily by following this handy guide! The address is, of course, our ENS: penguinparty.eth image700×1942 204 KB

UPDATE! Fish incoming!?!   Medium – 23 Oct 20    🦄Uniswap’s🦄 Penguin 🐧Party is bringing you Fish! 🐟 Hey there Penguins! Reading time: 2 min read         Uniswap’s  Penguin Party is bringing you Fish!    Hey there Penguins! Today, we’re proud to announce that we are preparing to introduce Fish , a new social currency to control PenguinParty.eth governance on an off-chain solution such as http://snapshot.page. https://miro.medium.com/max/346/1*3YktdUmwm1xF9BSaQqHm4Q.gif(image larger than 4096KB) We’d like you to think of this like Layer-2 of governance. By delegating to PenguinParty.eth, you can get your voice heard without paying all that pesky gas. This is exactly the kind of solution the little guy, the regular user, needs for governance. Fish  is a social currency that will:  Function as a reward mechanism to reward our delegators the right to vote in how Penguin Party will actually vote on-chain. -Function as a reward mechanism for software contributions to Penguin Party. -And will reward technical and non-technical users alike for discord discussions and ideation.  We have a working SourceCred Instance up on our Github which you can check out right now to view the current “Cred” leaderboard, a measurement of everyone’s current contributions to the project’s code and discussions! You can find that here: https://penguinparty-eth.github.io/SourceCred-Instance/#/explorer  Everyone loves to FISH right?! With Fish , the Gamification cycle will be complete and PenguinParty.eth will be even more decentralized. : )  Are you Penguins ready to go fishing? Signed, 0x0be0ecc301a1c0175f07a66243cff628c24db852 penguinparty.eth We have a set of links for our (many)social media platforms we’d like to share: -LINKS- Fish Scoreboard:https://penguinparty-eth.github.io/SourceCred-Instance/#/explorer Discord: https://discord.gg/XscWVvH Medium: http://medium.com/@Hiturunk Twitter: https://twitter.com/PenguinpartyE Twitter: https://twitter.com/HiturunkE Youtube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCvcz0jSa65MZSQMB3hMNAkA Github: https://github.com/penguinparty-eth/ Codecks [Our Project Management Platform]: https://open.codecks.io/-penguinparty/

Medium – 25 Oct 20    🐧Penguin Party Fish🐟 Token Has Launched! Greetings Penguins! We promised you 🐟, and now they are here! Reading time: 2 min read        Penguin Party Fish​:fish: Token Has Launched!   Greetings Penguins! We promised you , and now they are here! You may find the token contract for  on the Ethereum mainnet at the address: 0x30bcd71b8d21fe830e493b30e90befba29de9114 Every Penguin Party Voter has now received 1,000  as of BlockNumber#:11122755.  This was done by creating a dune analytics query to find unique addresses delegating to hiturunk.eth and penguinparty.eth, minting, and airdropping the tokens directly to users’ wallets in a batch transaction, which you can find here: https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb5d8e7dc65a544ba5cc9cfa3449aa22b00d79f006768c04482b7738739bb4138 The Initial Token minting was approximately as follows: 200,000 Total Supply 47,000–1,000 for each voter 15,000–5,000 for each founder, cComp, Hiturunk, Ncitron Founder Bonus — Hiturunk: 25k 113,000 to multi-sig for treasury  The current Gnosis multi-sig address ENS is: penguinparty.eth and the address is: 0x686B4535FF6573cef3FF37419A4fc6Ac775Ec7ea The multi-sig will function as the treasury for Penguin Party that co-delegators will control as stewards of the Penguin Party. The multi-sig will act in the spirit of the community through off-chain voting @ an incoming http://www.snapshot.page Space we are working on implementing. As we progress, we will implement new methods of onboarding co-delegates and further decentralize the Penguin Party and we are proud to have completed a major milestone in our project today and given you ! Waddle on, Penguins!  Signed, 0x0be0ecc301a1c0175f07a66243cff628c24db852 penguinparty.eth

I’m really digging the idea of a DAO on top of a DAO. I believe there is a place for it in the Uniswap governance system, and it is needed. Having a functional 2nd layer DAO would allow us to make small qualitative decisions that are extremely valuable when it comes to development and governance incentivization. It is pointless to make half a billion USD worth of UNI vote on a grant of 100k when we can do it on a smaller scale in an open, inclusive, and decentralized manner.

Let Your Vote Be Heard! — Penguin Party Fish​:fish: Can Now Be Used for Voting!   Medium – 26 Oct 20    Let Your Vote Be Heard! — 🐧Penguin Party Fish🐟 Can Now Be Used for Voting! The Penguin Party is proud to announce that 🐟 can now be used for proposing and voting in Penguin Party Governance on Snapshot.page… Reading time: 2 min read        Image for post1002×1002 70.5 KB The Penguin Party is proud to announce that  can now be used for proposing and voting in Penguin Party Governance on Snapshot.page: https://snapshot.page/#/penguin-party/community This means that now the voters truly get to have their votes heard on Uniswap by delegating to the decentralized PenguinParty.eth multi-sig controlled by three co-delegators and moving their decision-making to layer 2, that is: offchain.  With Snapshot, the community can now ideate and inform the co-delegators on governance issues pertinent to the community and inform the party’s decision-making in a safe, pseudonymous, and trustless manner…and best of all? No gas required! The first Proposal was already submitted, entitled: “Should PenguinParty vote Yes or No on Proposal 2 for Uniswap? #QmQF8c4” —  Current Tally of Votes…    snapshot.page    Snapshot      IN OTHER NEWS:  A major flaw in Wrapped-Delegated Uni V1 was detected by an observant user, and after internal discussions the co-delegators unanimously decided we would award them our first-ever bounty of 1,000 ! (We will target redeployment after further internal testing)  A Bug Bounty plan  is in the works! The Penguin Party dapp is developing nicely and multiple developers have joined the project. Three users missed out on the airdrop and will be compensated by the multi-sig treasury for the 1,000  they missed out on, by vote of the multi-sig. Community member Pooryia submitted some BEAUTIFUL logos!  More to come soon! Signed, 0x0be0ecc301a1c0175f07a66243cff628c24db852 penguinparty.eth  LINKS-  voting:https://snapshot.page/#/penguin-party/community  Scoreboard:https://penguinparty-eth.github.io/SourceCred-Instance/#/explorer  Discord: https://discord.gg/J3RFA3P Medium: http://medium.com/@Hiturunk Twitter: https://twitter.com/PenguinpartyE Twitter: https://twitter.com/HiturunkE Youtube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCvcz0jSa65MZSQMB3hMNAkA Github: https://github.com/penguinparty-eth/ Codecks [Our Project Management Platform]: https://open.codecks.io/-penguinparty/
